backend/main.mo: Main canister actor handling user profiles, logo upload, and full story CRUD with categories, thumbnails, YouTube links, and comments, protected by admin/user access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old story records into the new format by adding youtubeUrl and thumbnail fields initialized to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, feature IDs, related components, and test IDs for media and admin UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling utilities used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode colors and global styling rules for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes using TanStack Router and wraps them in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AdSlotPlaceholde: UI component displaying a styled placeholder card representing an advertisement slot.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateLinksPl: UI component rendering a styled placeholder section for affiliate book links.
Comments UI with authentication checks, comment posting, and listing using hooks for identity and backend comment APIs.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Navigation header component with logo, category links, search, mobile menu, and identity-based admin actions.
Button component that toggles night mode using local state from a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input form with clear and submit actions that triggers a callback with the query.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main site layout wrapper providing header, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with thumbnail, metadata, excerpt, and link to the full story.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching and adding comments for a story via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identities, status tracking, and clearing sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogo.ts: Hooks to fetch, upload, delete the site logo and convert logo data into a displayable URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useNightMode.ts: Hook managing night mode state persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Hooks for fetching, searching, and creating stories, including optional thumbnail upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useThumbnail.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, and deleting story thumbnails, plus a helper to convert stored logo data into a displayable URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining a horror-themed color palette, typography, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines story category metadata and helper functions to look up categories and labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogoPage.tsx: Admin interface for uploading, previewing, and deleting the site logo with validation and permission handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStoryNewPage.tsx: Admin form for creating new stories with fields for metadata, content, optional YouTube link, and thumbnail upload.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays stories for a specific category with loading states and a decorative horror-themed layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, ads, and a grid of the latest horror stories.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search interface that retrieves and displays stories matching a text query with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryPage.tsx: React page that loads and displays a full story with thumbnail, metadata, YouTube embed, night mode styling, and comments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Parses YouTube URLs, validates them, extracts video IDs, and generates embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site goals, implemented features, known issues, and architectural notes.
